config.crackerslib.preset.note: NOTE: Changing the preset may override other values, make backups!
config.crackerslib.preset.custom.title: Custom
config.crackerslib.preset.default.title: Default
config.crackerslib.preset.custom.descrip: Custom values defined by the user. Changing any value defaulted by a preset will change it to custom.
gui.crackerslib.button.preset.title: Preset
gui.crackerslib.button.preset.holdShift: Hold SHIFT to see a description
gui.crackerslib.button.reset.title: Reset
gui.crackerslib.button.exit.title: Exit
gui.crackerslib.button.exitAndSave.title: Save and Exit
gui.crackerslib.button.sorting.title: Sorting
gui.crackerslib.button.collapse.title: Collapse
gui.crackerslib.screen.config.home.title: CrackersLib Config
gui.crackerslib.screen.clientOptions.inf: Includes various config options for the client with varying purposes, such as performance and personal preference.
gui.crackerslib.screen.commonOptions.inf: Includes config options across all worlds.
gui.crackerslib.screen.serverOptions.not: Includes config options unique for each world. Can only be accessed while in a world.
gui.crackerslib.screen.serverOptions.inW: Includes config options unique for this world.
gui.crackerslib.config.hiddenConfigMenuB: A list of mod ids that cannot have their registered config menu buttons appear in the options screen
